author: hoju
msg: update license.  Will be tagging so that even though this shouldn't exist in  CVS HEAD anymore, a Log4j-1.2.8 version can still be attained from an updated tag (name to be determined).

author: hoju
msg: Improvements suggested by Andreas Werner (modularizing the methods and a few bug fixes), plus I now take care to modify the thread context class loader during initialization to avoid class cast exceptions based on the following article...
Note that this class, currently, is meant to work with Log4j-1.2.8.  The current CVS of Log4j-1.3.0 is not compatible.  That should change in a future version.

author: ceki
msg: Removed ThrowableClassFilter because this filter depended on a method
of LoggingEvent which was removed in 1.3

author: ceki
msg: Moved log4j-coding-convention.xml one level up. Removed the Jalopy directory.
